data.text: @drckarcher Hopefully it stays mild and no one else acquires it - Glen 20 is your best friend

@drckarcher 😔 it s ‘only an inconvenience’ if you have enough money/leave to cover the costs. Just had 7 days iso back at work 1.5 days then tested positive all with little sick leave and on contract. Hope yours is mild and soon over.
@drckarcher * brought * it home from school. Spellcheck.

@drckarcher Just don’t assume the whole family will be affected the same as the mildest fam member’s case. ...and don’t gaslight the worst affected. All the best and here’s hoping it stays no more than a mild inconvenience.
@drckarcher Just read a tweet from a woman whose friend in her 40s just died. A child bought it home from school. Covid is serious.
@drckarcher It’s hard to find a family with kids who aren’t affected. Take care xx
@drckarcher Hope you're all OK! Need any chocolate?
@drckarcher 2 of our are mildly symptomatic but neg RATs thus far.  Hopefully just hayfever on windy days.  Keep well mate and maybe means they will be more ready when the season begins?  👍
